title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       To search for events by dates, click on the small calendar icons to choose your start and end dates, then click on "Show Results" for a listing of programs. Or type in a keyword and click on "Show Results" to view programs by topic.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 11 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Nature Tots      Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Paul H. Douglas Center for Environmental Education Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Bring your 2-5 year old child to join a ranger as we read fun nature books and learn about natures during this 2 hour program. View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Mount Baldy Sunset Hike      Time: 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Begins at Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 12, 2016 While Mount Baldy remains closed to unrestricted public access, you can join a ranger for a special guided hike along a trail on the western edge of Mount Baldy. View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Pinhook Bog Open House      Time: 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Pinhook Bog Fees: Free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/28/2016 to 09/10/2016 Take an hour long self-guided hike into Indiana's only quaking bog. View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Bailly Homestead and Chellberg Farm Open House      Location: Bailly Homestead/ Chellberg Farm Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 05/29/2016 to 09/04/2016 Tour the Homestead and farmhouse to learn about the lives of early Duneland families. View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Mount Baldy Guided Hike      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Meets at the Indiana Dunes Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 While Mount Baldy remains closed to unrestricted public access, you can join a ranger for a special guided hike along a trail on the western edge of the dune.  Reservation Required View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Music Heritage Series      Time: 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Join the Save the Tunes Council and share in the celebration of old time music.  View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Campground Program      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Dunewood Campground Amphitheater Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join a ranger around the campfire and learn about the diversity of park resources.  View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore In a Pickle or a Jam      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Chellberg Farm Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join the farm cooks and learn how to preserve food. View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore NPS 100th Anniversary Concert      Time: 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM Location: West Beach Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 INDIANA DUNES NATIONAL LAKESHORE: Celebrate the 100th anniversary of the National Parks with a free concert by the Northwest Indiana Symphony on Saturday, August 27 at 7:30 pm. View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Mount Baldy Guided Hike      Time: 5:00 PM to 6:30 PM Location: Program Meets at the Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, September 2, 2016 While Mount Baldy remains closed to unrestricted public access, you can join a ranger for a special guided hike along a trail on the western edge of the dune.  Reservation Required.  View Details      Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore 1st Saturday Night Stargazing      Location: Kemil Parking Lot Fees: Free     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Enjoy the beauty of the night sky through telescopes from the darkest site in the park.  View Details
